name: New Tab
description: A beautiful and productive new tab experience with task management, notes, and live clock

content_security_policy.extension_pages: script-src 'self' 'wasm-unsafe-eval'; object-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' https://*.googleapis.com https://*.firebaseapp.com https://identitytoolkit.googleapis.com https://securetoken.googleapis.com wss://*.firebaseio.com

author: Naren Kumar
